name: 4r Soluciones
description:
4r Soluciones is a Custom Development Software Company located in Santa Fe, Argentina, working on US Eastern time. 
We count on 15 years of experience performing as IT Contractor/Vendor, providing solutions for Digital Agencies, Start-Ups, Software Companies, and Corporations.
Currently, the 25 people team covers areas of Design, Development, Project Management and Consulting with the capacity to handle large and complex projects. They keep a strong eye on processes implementation, change management and communications which are key for a successful project. We work mainly Fixed Price Projects, Time & Materials, and Staff Augmentation.
As your entrusted partner, we help to solve your business challenges with scalable software custom solutions and staffing resources. We would love to have you onboard!
